subject: Thanksgiving Day
Football
lead_paragraph: It will be the first Thanksgiving game for the Giants since 1992, when they lost to the Dallas Cowboys, 30-3, and only their third Thanksgiving Day game since 1938.
snippet: It will be the first Thanksgiving game for the Giants since 1992, when they lost to the Dallas Cowboys, 30-3, and only their third Thanksgiving Day game since 1938.
